title: Web Applications for Everybody
description: Hello and welcome to my site where you can work through these modules and learn develop PHP-based database-backed web applications.

modules.title: Installing PHP and SQL
modules.description: The first task is to work through the installation steps including installing a text editor, installing MAMP or XAMPP (or equivalent), creating a MySql Database, and writing a PHP program.

videos.title: Bonus: Brian Behlendorf on the Apache Software Foundation

modules.title: Introduction to Structured Query Language (SQL)
modules.description: We learn about single table queries and the basic syntax of the SQL language.

videos.title: Bonus: Elizabeth Fong - Creating the SQL Database Standards

modules.title: Database Design
modules.description: Covering database design with multiple tables, foreign keys, and the JOIN operation..

modules.title: Introduction to Dynamic Web Content
modules.description: We look at the basic structure of a web application and how a web browser interacts with a web server.   We explore the Request-Response Cycle that is the basis of the Hypertext Transport Protocol (HTTP).

videos.title: What Happens When You Click a Link? - Computerphile
